content.rendered: “Take a seat and relax as you observe the beauty of the tea leaves swelling in your teapot, and appreciate the exquisite aroma filling the air. With each mouthful feel the warmth of your tea move from your mouth to your stomach, then disperse through your body, expelling any feelings of stress and tension in the body.”
